lines.content: Hi, this chatbot is still a Noob.
He can echo what you type.
## Feature: Store three types of task.Task
He can store what you type as a task
Type `list` to list what he has stored for you
1. Type `mark` + `number` to mark tasks as done
2. Type `unmark` + `number` to mark tasks as not done
Type `bye` to say goodbye to him
# Hope you have fun with Noob!
System.out.println("\tOh nooooo!! The description of " + taskType + "is missing!!");
System.out.println("\tPlease add a spacing between " + identity + " and 'number'");
System.out.println("\tOops, you do not have this task");
System.out.println("\t\t1. Echo and store three types of tasks: 'todo', 'deadline' and 'event'.");
System.out.println("\t\t2. Type \"todo\" + \"taskContent\" to record a 'todo' task.");
System.out.println("\t\t5. Type \"list\" to see what I have recorded.");
System.out.println("\t\t6. Type \"mark\" + \"number\" to mark tasks as done.");
System.out.println("\t\t7. Type \"unmark\" + \"number\" to mark tasks as not done.");
System.out.println("\t\t8. Type \"bye\" to say goodbye to me.");
